encounter.encounterName: We each need to find our own inspiration, Kiki. Sometimes it's not easy.
encounter.summary: The world was young, the mountains green
encounter.description: Hideous gibbous decadent noisome manuscript blasphemous. Gibbering furtive stench loathsome fungus. Iridescence abnormal tenebrous. Shunned antediluvian gibbering. Stench cat tenebrous gambrel.
